text:
The people who were involved in the production of such
programs represent a cross section of opinion leadership in the
community. Business and professional men and women; local,
state and national public officials; educators; housewives;
civic action group members; workers; service club members;
clergymen; etc., have appeared on educational programs.
As noted previously, about UÂ£00 of these community leaders
have taken prominent on-the-air roles in ETV programs. The vast
number of others who have been active in planning, research,
writing and other behind-the-scenes production functions would be
almost impossible to assess.
38
